name: CSV Reader Processor
description: Reads out values as CSV from a field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field the CSV string resides in.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: The headers of the CSV string. These headers will form the names of the columns.

parameters.name: headers_from_first
parameters.description: If set to true, the first data packet will be used to extract headers from.

parameters.name: remove_original
parameters.description: Whehter to remove the original field.

parameters.name: quote
parameters.description: The quote character. Double quote (") by default.

parameters.name: escape
parameters.description: The escape character. Double backslash (\) by default.
